doc.title: Ieat End of Year Makan Session!
doc.text: Dear/JJ Readers/NN ,/, You/PRP are/VBP cordially/JJ invited/VBD to/TO our/PRP$ End/NN of/IN Year/NN Makan/NN Session/NN which/WDT will/VB be/VB held/VBD at/IN Siang/NNP Hee/NNP Restaurant/NN ./. Our/PRP$ makankakis/NNP ,/, Damien/NNP and/CC Champagne/RB have/VBN arranged/VBN a/DT sumptuous/JJ 10/CD course/NN menu/NN for/IN us/PRP which/WDT will/VB feature/NN their/PRP$ signature/JJ Pumpkin/NNP Prawns/NNP and/CC Crispy/NNP Ter/NNP Kah/NNP ./.
